TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowCompletedEventArgs extends System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEventArgs

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
When the workflow completes, the workflow runtime engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowCompleted> event. The workflow runtime engine passes all of the output parameters of the workflow in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowCompletedEventArgs>. These include the `out` and `ref` parameters of the workflow.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates an event handler method that takes <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowCompletedEventArgs> as a parameter. The `OnWorkflowCompleted` method is called when the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowCompleted> event is raised. The code uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowCompletedEventArgs.OutputParameters%2A> property to obtain the value associated with the `Status` key and writes it to the console.
This code example is part of the Sequential Workflow with Parameters SDK Sample from the Program.cs file. For more information, see [Sequential Workflow With Parameters](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/17157f2d-8fed-4848-a386-e4efa381b66b).
[!code-csharp[wf_samples#192](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets19.cs#192)] [!code-vb[wf_samples#192](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets19.vb#192)]

Docs.summary: Gets the output from the workflow.
Docs.value: A of values keyed by parameter name that contains the output parameters of the workflow.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowCompletedEventArgs.OutputParameters%2A> contains the `out` and `ref` parameters of the workflow.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to obtain a value from a key stored in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowCompletedEventArgs.OutputParameters%2A> property. The `OnWorkflowCompleted` method has a parameter that takes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowCompletedEventArgs>. This method is called when the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowCompleted> event is raised. The code uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowCompletedEventArgs.OutputParameters%2A> property to obtain the value associated with the `Status` key and writes it to the console.
This code example is part of the Sequential Workflow with Parameters SDK Sample from the Program.cs file. For more information, see [Sequential Workflow With Parameters](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/17157f2d-8fed-4848-a386-e4efa381b66b).
[!code-csharp[WF_Samples#192](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets19.cs#192)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#192](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets19.vb#192)]

Docs.summary: Gets an that represents the workflow definition on completion of the workflow instance.
Docs.value: An that represents the workflow definition on completion of the workflow instance.
